summary: This document contains email correspondence primarily between Karen Scandizzo and Nancy Mion regarding a request for assistance related to vehicle rentals in connection with an official police investigation. It discusses the rental history of a Nissan Sentra and mentions court schedules.

persons.name: Karen Scandizzo
persons.context: Karen Scandizzo is involved in the correspondence requesting assistance regarding vehicle rentals for an investigation.

persons.name: Nancy Mion
persons.context: Nancy Mion responds to Karen Scandizzo's request and discusses her court schedule.

persons.name: Banasiak
persons.context: Banasiak is mentioned as the individual who rented a Nissan Sentra that is relevant to the investigation.

persons.name: Alex
persons.context: Alex is mentioned in passing as having heard information relevant to the discussion.

persons.name: Miriam
persons.context: Miriam is mentioned in passing as having heard information relevant to the discussion.

persons.name: Tomlinson
persons.context: Tomlinson is referenced in relation to information discussed by Alex and Miriam.

connections.description: Karen Scandizzo and Nancy Mion are communicating about a request for assistance related to an investigation.
Alex and Miriam are mentioned together as having heard the same information regarding Tomlinson.

events.title: Court Appearance
events.description: Nancy Mion mentions she has a court appearance scheduled for noon.

events.title: Request for Vehicle Rental Information
events.description: Karen Scandizzo requests information about vehicle rentals related to an investigation.

keyFacts: Karen Scandizzo is involved in a request for assistance regarding vehicle rentals for an investigation.
Banasiak rented a Nissan Sentra with a Florida tag from December 12, 2005, until January 1, 2006.
Nancy Mion has a court appearance scheduled for noon on January 25, 2006.
Alex and Miriam discussed information related to Tomlinson.
The document includes a request for information about vehicles rented since December 23, 2005.
